propDescriptions.children:
The content of the component.
If ' ' is provided, the component reserves one line height for displaying a future message.
propDescriptions.classes: Sobrescreve ou extende os estilos aplicados para o componente. Veja a API CSS abaixo para maiores detalhes.
propDescriptions.component: The component used for the root node. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.
propDescriptions.disabled: If true, the helper text should be displayed in a disabled state.
propDescriptions.error: If true, helper text should be displayed in an error state.
propDescriptions.filled: If true, the helper text should use filled classes key.
propDescriptions.focused: If true, the helper text should use focused classes key.
propDescriptions.margin: If dense, will adjust vertical spacing. This is normally obtained via context from FormControl.
propDescriptions.required: If true, the helper text should use required classes key.
propDescriptions.sx: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles. See the `sx` page for more details.
